NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Support Services and column Enrollment Channels is the flow between 3194 and 4259? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Financial Aid to node Entrance Exams and from node Scholarships to node Employment, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node First-Generation to node Financial Aid, from node First-Generation to node Career Services, and from node Tutoring Centers to node Scholarships, which path has the largest flow?
